title: My friends in Diamond and gold are actually scared of playing Ranked now
body:
**They just play once every month or so and leave it.**

I ask them why and they told me a ton of reasons,** even before the declaration of Season end they refused to ranked after they hit their desired point.**
Aside from the trolls, afkers, and ragers even in Diamond, they still had a lot of reasons

**1. It is near Season end, and the servers as well as connection issues are horrid.**

**2. A lot of them often have problems where they suddenly spike in ping, and can't reconnect for a long time in games randomly. **Costing them the match. They have never in the last 2 years of playing league, experianced this type of lag, they all have very good internets

**3. Massive lag spikes** despite them having 30-40 ping for the past 2 years, which can sometimes lead to #2

4. **And entire teams dropping on one side while the enemy team never drops** just massive ping spikes distributed once sidedly, sometimes to both teams throughout the entire game. (blue would all lag, then purple, then blue again)


**When Veteran players are scared and refuse to play your game after they hit a certain point, there is an obvious issue with the game**
